about_the_game:
In Managun Wizard, you play as a mage armed with a powerful magic shotgun. Face waves of unique enemies, using quick thinking and smart tactics to survive. Battle through fast-paced rounds in a cursed dungeon where each victory brings you closer to breaking the endless cycle of rebirth.

Main Features

  • Dynamic Combat: Fight intense battles with magic and gunplay, combining spells and shotgun blasts to defeat a wide range of enemies.

  • Enemy Variety: Each enemy type has distinct behaviors, forcing you to adapt your strategy with every wave.

  • Upgrades: Unlock and upgrade abilities and weapons at the end of each round to make your wizard stronger.

  • Challenging Progression: Advance through increasingly difficult rounds in your quest to escape the cursed dungeon.

  • Endless Challenge: Each defeat sends you back to the start, but with new tactics and upgrades, you can push further next time.

  • Mutations: Stack different upgrades to cause your character to mutate, gaining unique bonuses and boosters.

Word to Player

Managun Wizard is in active development, with new features and improvements planned. The description will be updated as the game evolves to reflect new content and gameplay changes.

short_description: Play as a wizard with a magic shotgun and fight waves of enemies. Each enemy has its own behavior, so you need to think fast and use tactics to win. Defeat all enemies to move to the next round. Upgrade your managun, and choose new powers after each round.
